messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Current temp Grand Canyon. I can't read Celsius.

messages.name: search_location_around_lat_lon
messages.content: [{'phone_number': '+19286387888', 'name': 'Grand Canyon National Park', 'full_address': 'Grand Canyon National Park, Arizona', 'full_address_array': ['Arizona'], 'latitude': 36.2678855, 'longitude': -112.3535253, 'review_count': 62233, 'rating': 4.8, 'timezone': 'America/Phoenix', 'website': 'https://www.nps.gov/grca/index.htm', 'types': ['National park', 'Tourist attraction'], 'price_level': None, 'working_hours': {'Friday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Saturday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Sunday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Monday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Tuesday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Wednesday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Thursday': ['Open 24 hours']}, 'city': 'Arizona', 'is_claimed': True, 'state': 'Open 24 hours', 'description': ['Mile-deep landmark with panoramic vistas', 'Beyond its scenic overlooks, this mile-deep geologic wonder features hikes, mule rides & rafting.', None, 't', 't']}]

Seeing that we found “Grand Canyon National Park, Arizona,” I see no temperature information in the search results, so I still don’t have the actual current temperature for the Grand Canyon. I will now let the user know I was unable to get the temperature and ask if they have a specific source (like a weather service or a website) they’d like me to check, or if they can tell me what the Celsius reading is so I can convert it to Fahrenheit for them.
I don't have a specific source. Can you try checking a weather site or something?

I’m sorry—my available tools (location lookup, stock, holiday, unit-conversion, etc.) don’t include a live weather service, so I can’t pull the current temperature from a weather site for you. A quick option is to look up “Grand Canyon Village, AZ weather” on any major site like weather.com, Weather Underground, or the National Weather Service; they’ll display Fahrenheit right away.
Got it, I'll check those out. Thanks!
You're welcome! Stay cool out there at the canyon—have a great visit.
